item.description:
Feel like your yard (or your overpass) could use a little patriotic decoration? Join RonPaulHQ for a banner-making party, and bring the Ron Paul Revolution home.

We'll bring the supplies, you bring the labor. Weather willing, we'll have the great combination of barbeque, beer, and spray paint--resulting in banners that we'll use to adorn New Hampshire *and* show support for Dr. Paul at the New Hampshire debate on June 5th. (See that date on our calendar for details.)

Finally, if the logistics work, we'll also be raising what I can only describe as a billboard at the host's house, giving folks on Rt. 28 something to look at on their way to work. ;)

NOTE: I know Kevin's house is in Pembroke; Meetup just *thinks* it's in Suncook. Luckily, they both map the same way.
item.name: Sign-making and -raising party!
